songs.title: Ok Shorty!
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ayy, ayy
Yuh

[Chorus]
Okay, shorty, (Ayy!) okay, shorty (Yuh!)
Okay, shorty, (Yuh!) okay, shorty (Okay!)
Okay, shorty, (Okay!) okay, shorty (Okay!)
Okay, shorty
Throw that back, uh, yuh (Throw that)
Throw that back, uh, yuh (Throw that)
Throw that back, uh, yuh (Ayy!)
Throw that back, uh, yuh (Ayy)
Okay, shorty, (Okay!) okay, shorty (Okay!)
Okay, shorty, (Okay!) okay, shorty
Okay, shorty, (Ayy!) okay, shorty (Yuh!)
Okay, shorty, (Yuh!) okay, shorty
Throw that back, uh, yuh
Throw that back, uh, yuh (Ayy! Ay-ayy!)
Throw that back, uh, yuh (Yuh!)
Throw that back, uh

[Verse]
Spin on my dick, uh, yuh
Just like a fidget, uh, yuh (Ayy! ayy!)
When she on my dick, uh, ayy
Look like a midget, uh, ayy (Ayy!)
Okay, lil' shawty wan' eat on my body
Just like a Frito-Lay, uh, yuh
Just like I'm Phineas, or like lil' Ferb!
"What did you do today?," uh, yuh, ayy (Ayy-ayy, ayy-ayy)

[Interlude]
You already know I'm rockin' nigga (You already know I'm rockin' nigga)
I got Tank in the booth (I got Tank in the booth)
Haha! (Haha)
Where ya Glock at, Tank? (Where ya Glock at, Tank?)
Ayy! (Ayy, ayy!) Yuh! (Yuh!)

[Chorus]
Okay, shorty, okay, shorty
Okay, shorty, okay, shorty
Okay, shorty, okay, shorty
Okay, shorty
Throw that back, uh, yuh
Throw that back, uh, yuh (Ayy, ayy!)
Throw that back, uh, yuh (Ayy, ayy)
Throw that back, uh, yuh (Ayy, ayy!)
Okay, shorty, (Yuh!) okay, shorty (Ayy!)
Okay, shorty, (Ayy!) okay, shorty (Ayy!)
Okay, shorty, (Yuh!) okay, shorty (Ayy!)
Okay, shorty, (Yuh!) okay, shorty
Throw that back, uh, yuh
Throw that back, uh, yuh
Throw that back, uh, yuh (Ay-ayy!)
Throw that back, uh

[Outro]
Molly water, uh, yuh
